entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
